name: Midsommar: Dance of the Queen
description:
SINGLE-PLAYER ONLY (MULTIPLAYER COMING SOON).

CELEBRATE MIDSUMMER!

Gather around the maypole and dance with your fellow flowers.

You control ONE of TWELVE dancers. 

Step front, back, rotate and move around the maypole in compass with the other dancers.

The FLOWER BAR will FILL UP if you're dancing correctly, and RETREAT if you're not. If it becomes empty you'll have to start over.

PLAY WITH A CONTROLLER OR KEYBOARD AND MOUSE.

Music Credits:

FLOWERS OF MAY:

One Bard Band by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com

THE GOLDEN GATE:

Gates Of Glory by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com

Version 0.8 - EARLY ACCESS  (MORE DANCES AND MULTIPLAYER MODE COMING SOON)
